com.relayrides.pushy.apns

Class PushManagerConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.relayrides.pushy.apns.PushManagerConfiguration

  • public class PushManagerConfiguration
extends Object
    A set of user-configurable options that affect the behavior of a PushManager and its associated ApnsConnections.
    Author:
    Jon Chambers

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PushManagerConfiguration()
      Constructs a new push manager configuration object with all options set to their default values.
      PushManagerConfiguration(PushManagerConfiguration configuration)
      Constructs a new push manager configuration object with all options set to the values in the given configuration object.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean equals(Object obj) 
      int getConcurrentConnectionCount()
      Returns the number of concurrent connections to be maintained by push managers created with this configuration.
      ApnsConnectionConfiguration getConnectionConfiguration()
      Returns the configuration to be used for connections created by push managers created with this configuration.
      FeedbackConnectionConfiguration getFeedbackConnectionConfiguration()
      Returns the configuration to be used for connections to the APNs feedback service created by push managers with this configuration.
      int hashCode() 
      void setConcurrentConnectionCount(int concurrentConnectionCount)
      Sets the number of concurrent connections to be maintained by push managers created with this configuration.

      Sets the configuration to be used for connections created by push managers created with this configuration.
      void setFeedbackConnectionConfiguration(FeedbackConnectionConfiguration feedbackConnectionConfiguration)

        Constructs a new push manager configuration object with all options set to their default values.

      • PushManagerConfiguration

        public PushManagerConfiguration(PushManagerConfiguration configuration)

        Parameters:
        configuration - the configuration object to copy

    • Method Detail

      • getConcurrentConnectionCount

        public int getConcurrentConnectionCount()
        Returns the number of concurrent connections to be maintained by push managers created with this configuration.
        Returns:
        the number of concurrent connections to be maintained by push managers created with this configuration

      • setConcurrentConnectionCount

        public void setConcurrentConnectionCount(int concurrentConnectionCount)
        Sets the number of concurrent connections to be maintained by push managers created with this configuration. By default, push managers will maintain a single connection to the APNs gateway.
        Parameters:
        concurrentConnectionCount - the number of concurrent connections to be maintained by push managers created with this configuration

      • getConnectionConfiguration

        public ApnsConnectionConfiguration getConnectionConfiguration()
        Returns the configuration to be used for connections created by push managers created with this configuration. A set of default connection options is used if none is specified.
        Returns:
        the configuration to be used for connections created by push managers created with this configuration

      • setConnectionConfiguration

        public void setConnectionConfiguration(ApnsConnectionConfiguration connectionConfiguration)
        Sets the configuration to be used for connections created by push managers created with this configuration.
        Parameters:
        connectionConfiguration - the configuration to be used for connections created by push managers created with this configuration; must not be null
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if the given connection configuration is null

      • getFeedbackConnectionConfiguration

        public FeedbackConnectionConfiguration getFeedbackConnectionConfiguration()
        Returns the configuration to be used for connections to the APNs feedback service created by push managers with this configuration. A set of default options is used if none is specified.
        Returns:
        the configuration to be used for connections to the APNs feedback service created by push managers with this configuration

      • setFeedbackConnectionConfiguration

        public void setFeedbackConnectionConfiguration(FeedbackConnectionConfiguration feedbackConnectionConfiguration)
        Sets the configuration to be used for connections to the APNs feedback service created by push managers with this configuration.
        Parameters:
        feedbackConnectionConfiguration - the configuration to be used for connections to the APNs feedback service created by push managers with this configuration; must not be null
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if the given feedback connection configuration is null
